episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 9:  The Cult of Metaphysicians Part 2
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 9:  The Cult of Metaphysicians Part 2

We will see how things begin to fall apart for the Royal Fraternity of the Master Metaphysicians as lawsuits begin to fly over money.  And serious charges of grand larceny, fraud, and embezzlement will be leveled at Schafer. Would Schafer go to prison, and what would happen when his cult fell apart?  Would he try to place all of the blame on Oliver Napoleon Hill's shoulders?  Would this move work?

00:00  Introduction
01:06  Schafer and the 1940 World's Fair
02:10  Separation of Men and Women
04:15  Criminal Charges Filed Against Schafer
07:34  Blame Laid on Hill's Doorstep
09:56  Thank You

episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 8:  The Cult of Metaphysicians Part 1
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 8:  The Cult of Metaphysicians Part 1

While the Hills were trying to adopt the fifteen children, the Hills were going to Oakdale, Long Island, to visit the cult founded by James Bernard Schafer.  The name of the cult was the Royal Fraternity of the Master Metaphysicians.  The association with the cult would cause trouble for the Hill couple.  Come along with us as we walk through how the Hills came into contact with the cult.

00:00  Introduction
01:03  The Royal Fraternity of the Master Metaphysicians
03:43  Peace Haven
05:48  The Immortality Experiment
07:50  E.J. Kahn Jr. Visits Peace Haven
11:52  Thank You

episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 6: Life in the 1930s Part 2
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 6: Life in the 1930s Part 2

Sometimes a man just meets his match in a woman.  And so that was the case for Napoleon Hill.   The book, Think and Grow Rich, was now flying off the bookshelves.  But true to his nature, Napoleon Hill could not curb his tastes for the finer things in life.   And, because he wanted to keep all of the money to himself, he would make some mistakes concerning his family.  Come along with us as Napoleon Hill lets the love of money go to his head.

00:00  Introduction
01:10  The Hill's Prenup Agreement
02:44  Blair's Loan
04:17  How to Attract Men and Money
05:48  Thank You

episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 7: Hill Attempts to Adopt 15 Children
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 7: Hill Attempts to Adopt 15 Children

This one is by far one of the more bizarre schemes that Napoleon Hill has come up with thus far.  Basically, Think and Grow Rich was starting to dwindle in sales.   And none of the other ideas to bring in the royalties were not working.  What better advertisement for the New Thought movement than to raise a selected group of children using only those principles?  Come along with us as we walk through the idea of creating upstanding citizens using only the principles that Hill advocated.

00:00  Introduction
01:07  Adopting 15 Children
01:47  The First Children, Jeanne and Helen
03:08  Adoption Qualifications
05:15  Possible Reasons for the Adoptions
07:26  Thank You

episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 5:  Think and Grow Rich Part 1
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 5:  Think and Grow Rich Part 1

 When we last left Oliver Napoleon Hill, he was having trouble with his partnership with the Corianton Corporation.  True to form, Hill was not one to give up on being successful.   We will follow his story through the 1930s as he strives to once again dive into the business world.

00:57  The Early 1930s
02:19  Rosa Lee Beeland
04:00  Blair and Vera Hill
05:04  Rosa Lee Helps Write Think and Grow Rich

08:34  Thank You

episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 4:  The Law of Success
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 4:  The Law of Success

As we have seen, Oliver Napoleon Hill did not have much success when it came to business.  And his stories about the movers and shakers of industry were seen as tall tales.   But for the very first time, Hill would put pen to paper and it would end with his first successful endeavor.  Come along with us as Hill becomes a successful author.

00:00  Introduction
00:59  Meeting Andrew Pelton
02:47  The Plan
05:13  Hill's Success
08:06  Hard Times
10:26  The Corianton Corporation
13:23  Florence Divorces Oliver
14:30  Thank You

episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 3:  Fantastic Claims
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill Part 3:  Fantastic Claims

One of the best and kinda worst things about being Appalachian is our pension for telling tall tales.   And because of this, and the lack of actual evidence to back up the claims, has left people wondering if Hill was telling the truth or not about the famous people that he had encountered over the years.   We will walk through these claims today.  And we will also talk about how the evidence that backed these claims up was destroyed.


00:00  Introduction
01:44  Andrew Carnegie
04:19  Woodrow Wilson
06:14  Franklin Delano Roosevelt
07:07  Thomas Eddison
09:14  Destruction of Evidence
11:06  Thank You

episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill: Part 2: Business Failures
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill: Part 2: Business Failures

We are now going to enter Napoleon Hill's early business transactions.   While he did try to put his ideas into motion, they were not always successful.  Again, we always tell the good, the bad, and the ugly regarding history.  We do not cover up anything. We do encourage patience because this is only one facet of a very complex person.   Come walk with us as we go through some of Hill's most notorious business deals. 


00:00  Introduction
01:08  Acree-Hill Lumber Company
06:50  Automobile College of Washington
08:26  La Salle Extension University, Betsy Ross Candy Shop, Illinois Central Railroad, and George Washington Institute of Advertising
15:49  Hill's Golden Rule and Napoleon Hill's Magazine
16:43  Intra-Wall Correspondence School
17:50  Thank You

episodes.title: Oliver Napoleon Hill: Part 1: The Early Years
episodes.description:
Oliver Napoleon Hill: Part 1: The Early Years


Oliver Napoleon Hill is a very complex person in history.  Born in Pound, Virginia he would rise up to be one of the most influential motivational speakers that is still read to this day.   However, there are many who call him a flim-flam artist of his day.  We will try our best to take an unvarnished look at the life of Oliver Napoleon Hill to let you, our viewer decide which picture he represents.


00:00  Introduction
02:06  Early Years
03:42  Marriages
06:33  Thank You
